name: patch-terminals-terminalId-terminalLogos
description:
Updates the logo for the payment terminal identified in the path.

* To change the logo, specify the image file as a Base64-encoded string.
* To restore the logo inherited from a higher level (store, merchant account, or company account), specify an empty logo value.

To make this request, your API credential must have the following [role](https://docs.adyen.com/development-resources/api-credentials#api-permissions):
* Management APIâ€”Terminal settings read and write

terminalId.description: The unique identifier of the payment terminal.

data.description: The image file, converted to a Base64-encoded string, of the logo to be shown on the terminal.

$ul: **data**: The image file, converted to a Base64-encoded string, of the logo to be shown on the terminal.
